Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw two stick figures representing students without clear details.
The student attempts to draw a line between two cups, but it may not be straight or clearly represent a string.
CANNOT: The student cannot illustrate that the string needs to be tight for sound to travel effectively (may draw a loose, sagging string).
The student cannot show that the string is meant to carry sound (may not label or annotate sound travel aspects).
The student is unable to depict a real-world scenario of communication, instead showing unrelated scenes.
The student misunderstands the purpose of the string telephone, possibly thinking it is for decoration rather than communication.
The student doesn't include any annotations or labels indicating how sound travels through the string.
